02fac253-9bed-419f-8e1e-4efe1e08f382: This amulet grants its wearer +50% resistance to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary, they also heal <u>(1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} per Heretical rank)</u> each time they suffer toxic {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
042f54ed-0c38-43ca-9580-d8d7b5ed0fb1:
The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}) are decreased by −15.
The wearer can use {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} at 125 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} instead of 175 and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} at +50 momentum higher (capped at 100 momentum).
The wearer is considered as having {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent if they do not yet have it.
0605389c-c1fb-4316-b059-6b592143f4b7: Whenever the wearer and allies in a 2-cells radius gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, they also gain an equal amount of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
0d5e0415-e207-4095-afb4-17a0fa135689: The target of the wearer's Move, Move, Move! {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} automatically {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their current weapon and gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
114ee889-3af7-4c41-a265-95102f1b4e1a: When the wearer targets an ally with the Bring It Down! {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the first time in combat, that ally gains +1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}.
1682963f-4c20-4cea-8580-3b67afe47535: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to at least 2 enemies with one attack, they gain the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s Elusive Shadow {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.
1876d39c-5152-4a54-ae25-519ab5c18ed3: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} affect an ally. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} remains until the end of combat. Stacks.
1a69b955-c3db-4a2d-be96-02cc8e318d42: When the wearer successfully {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack, the target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}
1dd0aed5-0d2c-42be-972e-fece15ed2d24: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain <u>(wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the enemy hit by the wearer.
2301b896-b07a-4f18-979b-bec33c6560a3: Grants +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. ! For Asuryani and Drukhari only.
26d1dcbc-b108-4533-b0fb-9c6574b78b5d:
If the wearer doesn't wear any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, at the start of combat, they gain +<u>(20 + 4 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.
The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +2.
2fd31df6-4319-4dc3-afe0-e7d3e91b70af: Whenever the wearer uses Slash, Dash, or Kick, they gain +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +(wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} / 2 + 1) {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
305d4785-1525-4d16-8216-96365e9a222f: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} character also suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (3). Burning effects inflicted by the wearer have their power increased by +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g}</u>.
36199ab3-999a-4e35-853b-3845da415ae5: Whenever the wearer is the target of an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, the attacker becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The wearer will perform their lowest cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} attack against this enemy (including the {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon).
390d08c5-263f-4c8d-b426-30cd419def2e: Single attacks with bolter weapons automatically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the target.
3c198254-e255-4d33-a6c1-3ed9e47554e4: After the wearer uses Press the Advantage, if the wearer still has: - more than 5 tactical advantage stacks: the next attack ignores {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} - more than 10 tactical advantage stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} - more than 15 tactical advantage stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} If the wearer already has the Undisputed Advantage {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, then using Press the Advantage will only spend 1/4 of the tactical advantage stacks instead of 1/2.
45a1197c-b18d-4e95-81b3-a65442b01a31: As long as Cassia remains in the party, this amulet grants both the Rogue Trader and Cassia +<u>(Cassia's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to all their characteristics.
4b826d76-660e-4566-a54a-e6d4c4b9b859: This amulet grants the wielder a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} and a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Warhammer Intelligence} Intelligence{/g}.
518e0a36-66f5-4ce8-b775-30743d43596c:
Grants +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}, they also gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
5224f93b-38c1-428b-a652-a5b4bbcf504c: Whenever the wearer kills their target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, all enemies in a 2-cell {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} around the wearer suffer <u>wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
57e317cd-107c-43c0-8c82-9e125d8529b9:
At the start of combat, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
The wearer can't be {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary, they gain +2 resolve for each rank in Dogmatic and cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.
5bd202f1-7020-4fdf-818e-3e2bc6c848a5:
Grants a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g}.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a daemon or a psyker for the first time in combat, the target suffers −<u>(Lore (Warp) / 10)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.
5f381019-9048-49c1-835c-0445ced77da6:
All {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer have their power increased by +2.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, that enemy will now suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all the burning, bleeding, and toxin effects inflicted on them every time that enemy is hit by an attack.
60c8da09-431e-4ee6-9dcb-5bcc384bcf33: While {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is equal to or more than 10, the wearer deals +({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} bonus)% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with all {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}. ! Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.
65c65c88-5270-4267-99e7-4de3f9155b52: The wearer of this charm gains a +2% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each stack of the bonded souls effect.
663cc9ad-d3a3-493e-ba0b-319bd239b45d:
Whenever the wearer suffers a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this hit is prevented.
After that, a {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is inflicted on all characters in a 2-cell radius around the wearer until the end of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
67641c5b-ca91-4207-8eb8-c3b499a0b4ce: The wearer gains the Dash {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can be performed twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Whenever the wearer uses Dash, all adjacent enemies suffer −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Doesn't stack.
67a2ea94-abc8-418d-928b-799a1f0c6d7b:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary
At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (except for {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}), the wearer gains +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} for each ally (including themselves) with 50% or less {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
692852c4-9086-4479-9146-8bd190a61798: If only one of the wearer's Combat Tactics area is active in combat, the wearer gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
6d3cd1f6-37cc-427d-8766-e3b52daa640d: When the wearer of this badge gains a stack of versatility, they also gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
7325cc2c-8bb8-4666-aa0a-de6790247adb: The wearer gains the Move, Move, Move! {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. The wearer and targets of Move, Move, Move! are immune to the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} until the end of {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
940a11e7-21af-44c1-b110-57412dd457ff: All enemies suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} suffer a −30% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

a0e51b3c-7958-40a2-916d-f60c1b480d53: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, the wearer's nearest ally gains <u>(wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

ad5a86e4-2fd0-4726-805e-e32c42a1efbf:
The wearer deals an additional +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.
Whenever the wearer suffers a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is reduced by −30% until the end of combat.
adc8d005-6cf8-4a9a-bacf-77fda627cff3: Grants +<u>wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} to the wearer and their allies.
b474e6a7-98ae-4a10-9656-df4a48911a49: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} with a ranged weapon within {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g}, the target gains +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}. Perplexed: this creature suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} for each level of this effect.
bcb8bb8c-84db-4e50-966e-23309fe43549: The wearer gains the In My Sights {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and provides: -additional {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} -additional {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. The wearer also gains Aeldari Weapon Proficiency.
c24670a9-e7ae-42c6-b100-ca74d1e6300a:
Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal <u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} equal to <u>wearer's INT</u>) to all adjacent creatures.
If the number of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} creatures exceeds 3, the wearer suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.
c31957dd-49fb-49f2-b046-4b582321aab3: Whenever the wearer is under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of Reckless Rush: - all wearer's attacks gain +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} - the wearer gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} - all attacks against the wearer gain +50% critical hit chance and the wearer suffers +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}
cefb60de-f1e3-4d70-ab8c-9956c5d8f314: Each use of Revel in Slaughter increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} by +10 until the end of combat. Stacks.
d4c4ee12-95cb-429d-881d-082a6c3679b8: If the wearer inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} on a target, this target gets an additional +2 stacks of this effect.
dc374a2d-cc83-4361-8bd9-41e29300b1c6:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g}
<indent=5%>+4 maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</indent>
When {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is above 15:
<indent=5%>+10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>Each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} the wearer regenerates wounds equal to <u>wearer's Heretical rank</u></indent>
de35dac3-bdd2-46b3-8ebf-8e39932333ff: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} if their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} is less than 35.
e0a8031b-6b11-4e48-9b99-89c4e8c58dfc: The wearer gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} while they have 85% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} or more.
ebb76db6-2671-4d90-90ab-fa3c13a20cab:
The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent or above, their {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g} will depend on Fellowship instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
The wearer also gains +10 Lore (Imperium).
ef401cc6-e282-4627-9e07-5a7128e50f8a: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
f0515c84-0d56-4b7c-af17-86b3da18387c: The first use of each Navigator power in combat costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
f08c104f-2148-4759-a9f9-7586a28b9f3d: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary Whenever the wearer's ally receives {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the bonded souls {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Bonded Souls: the wearer gains a +2% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to damage for each stack of bonded souls.
feae592c-0656-4159-85af-c45d262cada9:
The wearer gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} and +20 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}.
